languages.text: {n}Ее голос едва слышен, но вам удается разобрать слова.{/n} "Я не помню, как здесь оказалась... не помню, что со мной было... был яркий свет, как от сварки... а потом... потом свет протянул ко мне лапы..." {n}Она со стоном хватается за голову.{/n}

{n}Her voice is barely audible, but you manage to make out the words:{/n} "I don't remember how I ended up here... don't remember what happened... there was a bright light, like from arc-welding... and then... the light reached out with its clutches..." {n}She moans and holds her head.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ее голос едва слышен, но вам удается разобрать слова.{/n} "Я не помню, как здесь оказалась... не помню, что со мной было... был яркий свет, как от сварки... а потом... потом свет протянул ко мне лапы..." {n}Она со стоном хватается за голову.{/n}

{n}Her voice is barely audible, but you manage to make out the words:{/n} "I don't remember how I ended up here... don't remember what happened... there was a bright light, like from arc-welding... and then... the light reached out with its clutches..." {n}She moans and holds her head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你几乎听不清她的声音，但你还是听到了这些话。{/n}“我不记得我怎么会来到这个地方……不记得发生了什么事情……当时有一道亮光，就像电弧一样……之后……那道光伸出了魔爪……”{n}她呻吟着，抱住了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is barely audible, but you manage to make out the words:{/n} "I don't remember how I ended up here... don't remember what happened... there was a bright light, like from arc-welding... and then... the light reached out with its clutches..." {n}She moans and holds her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你几乎听不清她的声音，但你还是听到了这些话。{/n}“我不记得我怎么会来到这个地方……不记得发生了什么事情……当时有一道亮光，就像电弧一样……之后……那道光伸出了魔爪……”{n}她呻吟着，抱住了头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apenas logras oír su voz, pero distingues sus palabras:{/n} «No sé cómo acabé aquí... no recuerdo qué pasó... hubo una luz brillante, como cuando están soldando algo... y después... la luz alargó sus garras...». {n}Gime y se sujeta la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is barely audible, but you manage to make out the words:{/n} "I don't remember how I ended up here... don't remember what happened... there was a bright light, like from arc-welding... and then... the light reached out with its clutches..." {n}She moans and holds her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apenas logras oír su voz, pero distingues sus palabras:{/n} «No sé cómo acabé aquí... no recuerdo qué pasó... hubo una luz brillante, como cuando están soldando algo... y después... la luz alargó sus garras...». {n}Gime y se sujeta la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}女の声は聞き取りにくかったが、何とか言葉を理解できた。{/n}「思い出せない、何故ここに…思い出せない、何が起きたのか…アーク溶接のように、輝く光が、見えて…それから…光が爪の元に…」{n}女は呻き声をあげて、頭を押さえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is barely audible, but you manage to make out the words:{/n} "I don't remember how I ended up here... don't remember what happened... there was a bright light, like from arc-welding... and then... the light reached out with its clutches..." {n}She moans and holds her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}女の声は聞き取りにくかったが、何とか言葉を理解できた。{/n}「思い出せない、何故ここに…思い出せない、何が起きたのか…アーク溶接のように、輝く光が、見えて…それから…光が爪の元に…」{n}女は呻き声をあげて、頭を押さえる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ihre Stimme ist kaum hörbar, aber du verstehst dennoch, was sie sagt:{/n} "Ich weiß nicht mehr, wie ich hier oben gelandet bin ... weiß nicht mehr, was passiert ist ... das war ein helles Licht, wie beim Lichtbogenschweißen ... und dann ... streckte das Licht seine Pranken aus ..." {n}Sie stöhnt und hält sich den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is barely audible, but you manage to make out the words:{/n} "I don't remember how I ended up here... don't remember what happened... there was a bright light, like from arc-welding... and then... the light reached out with its clutches..." {n}She moans and holds her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre Stimme ist kaum hörbar, aber du verstehst dennoch, was sie sagt:{/n} "Ich weiß nicht mehr, wie ich hier oben gelandet bin ... weiß nicht mehr, was passiert ist ... das war ein helles Licht, wie beim Lichtbogenschweißen ... und dann ... streckte das Licht seine Pranken aus ..." {n}Sie stöhnt und hält sich den Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il vous faut tendre l'oreille pour entendre la suite :{/n} « Je ne sais pas comment je me suis retrouvée ici... Je ne me rappelle pas ce qu'il s'est passé... Il y a eu une lumière vive, comme celle d'un arc de soudage... et puis... la lumière a m'étreindre... » {n}Elle gémit en se prenant la tête dans les mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is barely audible, but you manage to make out the words:{/n} "I don't remember how I ended up here... don't remember what happened... there was a bright light, like from arc-welding... and then... the light reached out with its clutches..." {n}She moans and holds her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous faut tendre l'oreille pour entendre la suite :{/n} « Je ne sais pas comment je me suis retrouvée ici... Je ne me rappelle pas ce qu'il s'est passé... Il y a eu une lumière vive, comme celle d'un arc de soudage... et puis... la lumière a m'étreindre... » {n}Elle gémit en se prenant la tête dans les mains.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sesi zor bela duyulsa da kelimelerini seçmeyi başarıyorsun.{/n} "Buraya nasıl geldiğimi bilmiyorum... Ne olduğunu anımsayamıyorum... Ark kaynağına benzer... Parlak bir ışık vardı... Sonra... Sonra ışık bana ulaştı ve... Kavrayarak..." {n}İnildeyip başını tutuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is barely audible, but you manage to make out the words:{/n} "I don't remember how I ended up here... don't remember what happened... there was a bright light, like from arc-welding... and then... the light reached out with its clutches..." {n}She moans and holds her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesi zor bela duyuluyor ancak kelimelerini seçmeyi başarıyorsun.{/n} "Buraya nasıl geldiğimi bilmiyorum… Ne olduğunu anımsayamıyorum… Ark kaynağına benzer… Parlak bir ışık vardı… Sonra… Sonra ışık bana ulaştı ve… Pençeleri…" {n}İnildeyip başını tutuyor.{/n}
